EmailTemplate.name: ES-2016-03-16-Arista Meetup.EMAIL-Arista Meetup
EmailTemplate.subject: Join us in Pittsburg on 3/23 for Drinks and Hybrid Cloud Use Cases
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi Operations Manager Lite User, Your feedback means a lot to us, at VMTurbo we are always trying to learn how we can improve your experience. We have set up a brief survey asking for your experience using Operations Manager Lite. The survey should not take any longer than 3 minutes to complete. Once you complete the survey you will be entered to win one of 10 Amazon $10 gift cards. Please fill out the survey by March 31st. <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/OperationsManagerLite]]> - The VMTurbo Team
